summary: Issue about detecting UnsupportedQuery exceptions correctly based on gRPC status code INVALID_ARGUMENT in the Ruby SDK. This issue is no longer applicable as the SDK underwent a rewrite.
userImpact: Users may not be able to correctly identify UnsupportedQuery errors in Ruby SDK workflows.
rootCause: SDK query exception detection not properly mapping gRPC INVALID_ARGUMENT status codes to UnsupportedQuery exceptions.
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent a rewrite/refresh and this issue no longer applies to the current version.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
